general.gigTitle: design and develop a responsive modern wordpress website for your business

sellerCard.description: Hello, my name is Martin. I am a full-time WordPress developer with over 7 years of experience and more than 500 completed WordPress projects on Fiverr. I create beautiful, mobile-friendly WordPress websites that also convert. Feel free to send me a message, and let's discuss your project :)

description.content:
Do you need a WordPress website for your business?


If you're looking to establish a professional online presence with a WordPress website, then this gig is tailored for you.


I'm Martin, and building WordPress websites is my passion. As of 2023, I've successfully built over 700 here on Fiverr and hundreds more for agency clients.


Your satisfaction is my utmost priority, and to ensure that, I provide Unlimited Revisions across all my packages. I'll diligently work on your WordPress website until you are thrilled with the results.


Upon completion, I will provide instructions on how to edit the website so you can manage it yourself without paying anyone for help.


WHAT TO EXPECT:

  • Fully Responsive Design
  • Customized Design for Your Business
  • SEO Friendly
  • Fast Loading Times
  • Easily Editable
  • Unlimited Revisions
  • 1 Month of Free Support After Completion
  • Newsletter Form
  • Social Media Integration


WHY CHOOSE ME?

  • Top-Rated Pro Fiverr Seller
  • Over 7 Years of Experience
  • 400+ Five-Star Reviews


Read my gig reviews to see that I do what I say and donÂ´t just give empty promises.


Let me help you grow your business.


Send me a message :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need a domain and hosting (if you don't have one, I can assist you). You should also have a logo and text prepared. I can build your WordPress website with dummy placeholder text if you don't have text prepared.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I message you before placing an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I first need to discuss your project with you to make sure I understand your requirements. This will also allow me to tell you if the above packages will cover your website or if you will need a custom quote.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide a satisfaction guarantee?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer Unlimited Revisions = 100% Satisfaction Guarantee â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜†â˜† :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you connect domain to my hosting and install WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes of course, it's included in all my gigs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I have to provide you the images for the website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I can look for suitable free stock images.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will be able to edit your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide any support after the site is launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I offer one month of post-sale support, but you can contact me even after that time. I am always here to help :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have your email, Skype or WhatsApp?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, this is against the Terms of Service of Fiverr. I will only respond to messages on Fiverr. I never communicate outside of Fiverr.

openGraph.title: design and develop a responsive modern wordpress website for your business

reviews.comment: A fantastic experience, going above and beyond to resolve issues along the way. ensuring my project was ready on-line for launch day. Martin's also created my website, which he did a great job also.

seller_response.comment: I'm glad I could help, Peter! Hope your launch goes smoothly.

reviews.comment:
I had the pleasure of working with Martin on the development of my new website, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the results. From the very beginning, Martin demonstrated exceptional professionalism, creativity, and attention to detail.

He not only understood my vision but also brought innovative ideas to the table that elevated the project beyond my expectations. His ability to seamlessly blend functionality with an eye-catching design has resulted in a website that is both user-friendly and visually stunning.

Throughout the collaboration, Martin was always responsive, patient, and willing to make adjustments to ensure everything was perfect. His commitment to delivering high-quality work on time is truly commendable.

I highly recommend Martin to anyone looking for a skilled and reliable web designer. I am grateful for his excellent work and look forward to collaborating with him again in the future.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Andreas! It was a pleasure working with you as well. I'm really glad I could help bring your vision to life and that you're happy with the final result.

I truly appreciated your clear communication and openness to new ideas throughout the projectâ€”it made the whole process smooth and enjoyable. Looking forward to the possibility of working together again in the future!

Thanks again for your trust, support, and the generous tip.

reviews.comment: It was a real pleasure working with Martin. Extremely professional, thoughtful and fantastic with communications. I am very happy with the delivery of my website and would definitely recommend him to others! Would definitely go back for future work! Thanks Martin!

seller_response.comment: Thank you, Lucy! I look forward to working with you again. Wishing you the best of luck with your consulting business!

reviews.comment: Martin is the best, i can not thank him enough and i highly recommend everyone to reach out to him for all your website/landing pages. Thank you so much my friend, your a legend!!!

seller_response.comment: Thank you, Anton! Best of luck with your physical therapy clinic!

notableClients.name: Ecove Group
notableClients.interaction_description: I had the pleasure of working with the Australian real estate developer Ecove Group. My task was to create a new WordPress website with a clean design and minimalistic full-width slider showcasing their projects.

enriched_details.name: Ecove Group
enriched_details.description: The Ecove Group are an Australian owned and operated Company that has a long and successful history in the development of large scale projects. The company has been actively involved in the property development sector, undertaking extensive major residential, retail, commercial and infrastructure projects.

notableClients.name: Ambleside Chiropractic Clinic
notableClients.interaction_description: I was hired by Andrew, the owner of Ambleside Chiropractic Clinic, to create a website for his business. I have helped Andrew build many websites over the years, for example, for his shockwave therapy business and some of his personal projects.

enriched_details.name: Ambleside Chiropractic Clinic
enriched_details.description: Ambleside Chiropractic Clinic is a chiropractor in West Vancouver, Canada.

notableClients.name: Zennith
notableClients.interaction_description: Creation of a sleek, modern website for ZenHR, a cutting-edge HR platform tailored for small and medium-sized businesses.

enriched_details.name: Zennith
enriched_details.description: Zennith provides a comprehensive HR platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses, facilitating efficient people management by consolidating onboarding, data storage, and administrative tasks into a single secure solution.

notableClients.name: Law Office of James Zier
notableClients.interaction_description: Designed and developed a professional, SEO-optimized website for James Zier, a Texas-based personal injury law firm, featuring extensive service pages that target specific accident types. The site is designed to drive client inquiries to the firm.

enriched_details.name: Law Office of James Zier
enriched_details.description: James Zier, a Pearland personal injury attorney with over 20 years of experience, specializes in achieving exceptional results in personal injury, accident, and wrongful death cases. Clients can rely on his expertise to recover monetary damages for inj...
